s0051: Shuo married Jin Cheng Gong sister as wife.
s0052: Jin Jing Gong third year, grand master Tu An Jia wished executed Zhao clan.
s0053: Initially, Zhao Dun at time, dreamed Shu Dai held belt cried, very sad;
s0054: Already laughed, clapped hands moreover sang.
s0055: Dun divined it, omen broke then good.
s0056: Zhao historian Yuan interpreted it, said: 'This dream very bad, not lord body, then lord son, however also lord blame.
s0057: To grandson, Zhao will generations increasingly decline.'
s0058: Tu An Jia, began favored by Ling Gong, when reached Jing Gong Jia as Sikou, about made difficulty, then treated Ling Gong traitor to involve Zhao Dun, widely told various generals: 'Dun though not knew, still traitor head.
s0059: With minister assassinated lord, sons grandsons in court, with what punish crime?
s0061: Han Jue said: 'Ling Gong encountered traitor, Zhao Dun outside, my previous lord considered no crime, thus not executed.
s0062: Now various lords will executed his descendants, this not previous lord intent now arbitrarily executed.
s0064: Minister has great matter lord not heard, this no lord.'
s0066: Han Jue told Zhao Shuo hasten fled.
s0067: Shuo not willing, said: 'You certainly not cut Zhao sacrifices, Shuo die not regret.'
s0068: Han Jue promised, claimed illness not out.
s0069: Jia not requested yet arbitrarily with various generals attacked Zhao clan at lower palace, killed Zhao Shuo, Zhao Tong, Zhao Kuo, Zhao Ying Qi, all extinguished their clans.
s0070: Zhao Shuo wife Cheng Gong sister, had pregnant belly, fled palace hid.
s0071: Zhao Shuo guest called Gong Sun Chu Jiu, Chu Jiu told Shuo friend Cheng Ying: 'Why not die?'
s0072: Cheng Ying said: 'Shuo wife has pregnant belly, if fortunately male, I serve him;
s0074: Dwelt no long, Shuo wife gave birth, bore male.
s0075: Tu An Jia heard, searched palace middle.
s0076: Lady placed child chided crevice blessed: 'Zhao clan extinguish? If cry;
s0078: When searched, child finally no sound.
s0079: Already escaped, Cheng Ying told Gong Sun Chu Jiu: 'Now one search not got, after certainly moreover search, how?'
s0080: Gong Sun Chu Jiu said: 'Establish orphan with die which difficult?'
s0081: Cheng Ying said: 'Die easy, establish orphan difficult.'
s0082: Gong Sun Chu Jiu said: 'Zhao clan previous lord treated you thick, you strong for their difficult, I for their easy, please first die.'
s0083: Then two persons plotted took other person infant carried it, clothed with embroidered blanket, hid mountain middle.
s0084: Cheng Ying out, falsely told various generals: 'Ying not worthy, cannot establish Zhao orphan.
s0085: Who able with me thousand gold, I tell Zhao clan orphan place.'
s0086: Various generals all happy, promised him, sent troops followed Cheng Ying attacked Gong Sun Chu Jiu.
s0087: Chu Jiu falsely said: 'Small man Cheng Ying!
s0088: Former lower palace difficulty could not die, with me plotted hid Zhao clan orphan child, now again sold me.
s0089: Even cannot establish, yet bear sold him?'
s0091: Zhao clan orphan child what crime?
s0092: Please live him, alone kill Chu Jiu can.'
s0093: Various generals not allowed, then killed Chu Jiu with orphan child.
s0094: Various generals considered Zhao clan orphan child indeed died, all happy.
s0095: However Zhao clan true orphan then instead at, Cheng Ying finally with together hid mountain middle.
s0096: Dwelt fifteen years, Jin Jing Gong ill, divined it, great enterprise after not succeeded as calamity.
s0097: Jing Gong asked Han Jue, Jue knew Zhao orphan at, then said: 'Great enterprise after in Jin cut sacrifices, perhaps Zhao clan?
s0098: Self Zhong Yan all Ying surname.
s0099: Zhong Yan person face bird beak, descended assisted Yin emperor Da Wu, and Zhou heavenly son, all had bright virtue.
s0100: Down to You Li without way, Shu Dai left Zhou went Jin, served previous lord Wen Hou, to Cheng Gong, generations had established merit, not tasted cut sacrifices.
